question:
Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate to the 22nd floor balcony. At your current location, if the balcony on the 22nd floor is not within your field of view, what is the most relevant object in your field of view, and where is this object?  
Choose:  
A. The balcony on the 22nd floor is not within my field of view, but the main body of the target high-rise building is in the center of my field of view.  
B. I can already see the balcony on the 22nd floor.  
C. I cannot see the balcony on the 22nd floor, but the front of the high-rise building is on the right side of my field of view.  
D. I cannot see the balcony on the 22nd floor, but there is a park in the lower left corner of my field of view.  
E. I cannot see the balcony on the 22nd floor, but there is a bus stop on the lower right side of my field of view.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: A; Reason: The balcony on the 22nd floor is not within the field of view, but the main body of the target high-rise building is prominently in the center of the field of view.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 1)]
Option: A
Reason: At the initial position (0-1s), the camera is looking upwards at a very tall high-rise building. The 22nd floor balcony is not visible or identifiable at this angle. The most prominent and relevant object in the field of view is the main body of this high-rise building, which occupies the center and left portion of the frame. The provided answer is consistent with this observation.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: A; Reason: The balcony on the 22nd floor is not within the field of view, but the main body of the target high-rise building is prominently in the center of the field of view.
